cave_fog_stabilizer.config.stabilizeCave: Whether to stabilize fog when underground or not.
cave_fog_stabilizer.config.fogTransition: The time in seconds it takes to transition between fog color changes.
cave_fog_stabilizer.config.standardCaveF: The brightness of caves which don't have a custom fog color.
cave_fog_stabilizer.config.customCaveFog: The brightness of caves which have a custom fog color.
